ingredients.ingredient: 1 russet potato, cut into evenly sized strips

cookingTips: Soak cut potatoes in cold water for 30 minutes to remove excess starch
Double fry technique: first at 325°F to cook through, then at 375°F for crispiness
Salt immediately after removing from oil while still hot
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Teach the user about the two-stage frying method and why potato variety matters.
